title: Stuffed lamb and feta peppers
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '6 medium green peppers', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh dill', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground allspice', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '150g cooked rice', '225g minced lamb', '150g crumbled feta cheese', '250ml passata', '250ml cold water', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '1 teaspoon caster sugar']
